subject: Work with us
body:
********************************************
Whatever you're doing, stop right now 

and call this number:

888.895.2887

US and Canada Only



Here is why you should call


It will, quite literally, enable you to earn any 

where from $10,000 to $30,000 within the next 30 days,

and possibly $100,000+ over the next 3-6 months. 



Better still, there's NO selling, NO following up,

NO closing, NO speaking to prospects & NO answering

questions . simply because the company does it ALL 

for you - and you receive up to $3,000 on every sale. 



I know it sounds too good to be true, but it really 

is happening right now.



In fact, a good friend of mine who is a stay at 

home Mom also thought it was too good to be true 

when she first saw it . then she tried it, and 

went on to make $130,000 in her first 13 weeks! 



I received 4 sales for a total of $12,000 in my 

first week!


By the way, the business is totally Risk Free*, 

as it comes complete with a 100% income and 

*Money*-Back *Guarantee*.



Here's that number again:

888.895.2887



Let's chat soon!



Not interested then send me a message back to let me know ok?

Thanks
